macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq near record highs as Santa rally and year‑end flows support markets
items.summary: Major U.S. indexes traded around record levels into the year‑end, with the S&P 500 within about 1% of 7,000 after posting a record close earlier in the week and the Nasdaq also near all‑time highs amid light holiday trading and year‑end portfolio flows[2][3].

items.title: SPY and QQQ finish week strong with momentum indicators bullish
items.summary: ETF trackers showed leadership in the S&P 500 ETF (SPY) marking fresh all‑time highs and closing the week higher while QQQ also finished the week up, with technical momentum indicators (RSI/MACD) signaling continued upside into the holiday period[1].

items.title: Precious metals surge—silver leading gains amid physical demand and supply concerns
items.summary: Silver and gold continued to climb, with silver particularly strong (prices above $70–$78 in different reports) as physical demand and export rules out of China tightened inventories and miners outperformed[3][1].

items.title: Market commentary: narrow leadership with semiconductors and select cyclicals outperforming
items.summary: Market analysts noted 2025’s leadership favoring scarcity and select tech—semiconductors and cyclicals led gains while defensives, real estate and long bonds lagged amid a higher‑for‑longer rate backdrop[1][2].

items.title: Watch for Fed minutes and central bank signals during holiday‑thin trading
items.summary: Investors were focused on the Federal Reserve’s recent meeting minutes and other central bank signals as light holiday volumes can amplify moves; these minutes were highlighted as the main macro event for the holiday‑shortened week[2].

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: BTC and ETH slide as token unlocks and macro headwinds weigh on markets
items.summary: Crypto markets fell over the past 24 hours with Bitcoin down ~4.4% and Ethereum down ~9.3% as large token unlocks and macroeconomic pressures increased volatility and selling pressure, according to market commentary and token-unlock trackers.

items.title: Binance market update: majority of large caps hold gains; market cap near $2.97T
items.summary: Binance reports the global crypto market cap around $2.97 trillion with many top assets trading modestly higher in their snapshot—BTC trading near the mid-$87k range and ETH near $2,942—while some smaller tokens outperform significantly.

items.title: Bitcoin shows short-term bullish structure but low volume suggests sideways trading
items.summary: Technical commentary indicates BTC is slightly bullish on the hourly chart and trading around $87.9k, but low volume implies sideways price action is more likely near-term absent fresh catalysts.

items.title: Precious metals surge outpaces Bitcoin amid hard-asset rotation
items.summary: Analysts note gold and silver have surged to record levels, outpacing Bitcoin and raising questions about Bitcoin's role as 'digital gold' as investors rotate into tangible hard assets.

items.title: Coinbase Institutional names three themes set to dominate crypto in 2026
items.summary: Coinbase Institutional published its outlook saying structural shifts will reshape trading, risk and real-world adoption in 2026, highlighting several key areas for institutional focus next year.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
